RelatedSentence: Speculation has been brewing for weeks over whether Edward Snowden will testify against the NSA from Moscow or Germany .

With the German parliament currently investigating spying by the National Security Agency on Chancellor Angela Merkel 's cell phone and the communications data of millions of German citizens , testimony by former NSA employee and whistleblower Edward Snowden was expected to take center stage in the proceedings .

With the German parliament currently investigating spying by the National Security Agency on Chancellor Angela Merkel 's cell phone and the communications data of millions of German citizens , testimony by former NSA employee and whistleblower Edward Snowden was expected to take center stage in the proceedings .

But a four - page letter from Snowden 's German attorney , Wolfgang Kaleck , obtained by SPIEGEL , casts doubt on whether he will be able to provide testimony from Moscow for the parliamentary investigative committee .
